scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:api && pnpm run lint:frontend && pnpm run lint:extension && pnpm run lint:mcp
scripts.format: pnpm run format:api && pnpm run format:frontend && pnpm run format:extension && pnpm run format:mcp
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "cd api && pnpm run dev" "cd frontend && pnpm run dev" --names "API,Frontend" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.test:e2e:dev: pnpm run dev:full & sleep 10 && cd frontend && pnpm run test:e2e; pkill -f "pnpm run dev"
